patch.value: sleep 10 && export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID={KEY_ID} && export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY={ACCESS_KEY} && echo 'hello' > /work/file1.txt && echo 'world' > /work/file2.txt && aws --no-verify-ssl --endpoint https://s3.default.svc:443 s3 cp /work/file1.txt s3://{BUCKET} && aws --no-verify-ssl --endpoint https://s3.default.svc:443 s3 cp /work/file2.txt s3://{BUCKET}

attempt_errors: bad path or conflict: member 'securityContext' not found in {'containers': [{'image': 'open-liberty:full-java11-openj9', 'imagePullPolicy': 'IfNotPresent', 'name': 'openliberty', 'ports': [{'containerPort': 9080}], 'envFrom': [{'configMapRef': {'name': 'mock-envvar'}}], 'volumeMounts': [{'mountPath': '/config/jvm.options', 'subPath': 'jvm.options', 'name': 'mock-jvm'}], 'securityContext': {'runAsUser': 1001, 'privileged': False, 'allowPrivilegeEscalation': False, 'readOnlyRootFilesystem': True, 'capabilities': {'drop': ['NET_RAW', 'NET_ADMIN', 'SYS_ADMIN', 'SYS_MODULE', 'SYS_PTRACE', 'SYS_CHROOT']}}, 'resources': {'limits': {'cpu': '500m', 'memory': '256Mi'}}, 'readinessProbe': {'initialDelaySeconds': 30, 'httpGet': {'port': 9080}}}], 'volumes': [{'name': 'mock-jvm', 'configMap': {'name': 'mock-jvm'}}]}
